system.availability:
Gain +10 to Tests to resist Toxins, Disease, and Radiation, Gain Die Hard Talent. Good Craftsmanship: Gain +20 to tests instead of +10, gain Regeneration Trait.
Causes a Greying of the Skin, and Tech-Priest's Blood is replaced, meaning normal Blood Transfusions will not work. Requiring Instead more of whatever serum goes through them.
system.cost:
Must be Tech-Prist with Autosanguine Talent/Implant
Good Craftsmanship costs 17000
